description.value:
Your healing energies empower attacks.

An ally that recovers Hit Points from your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Lay on Hands] gains a +1 status bonus to their attack rolls and deals 1 additional spirit damage on all their Strikes until the end of their next turn. In addition, all their Strikes are holy until the end of their next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Spell Effect: Amplifying Touch]
